import React, { useEffect ,useState} from "react" import PropTypes from "prop-types" import { connect } from "react-redux" import { isEmpty, map, size } from "lodash" import { Link, withRouter } from "react-router-dom" import classNames from "classnames" import { Card, CardBody, CardTitle, Col, Row,Label, ButtonDropdown,Button,DropdownMenu,DropdownItem,DropdownToggle,} from "reactstrap" //Import Breadcrumb import Breadcrumbs from "../../components/Common/Breadcrumb" import ReactApexChart from "react-apexcharts" import avatar1 from '../../assets/images/users/avatar-3.jpg' import { options, series, statusClasses } from "../../common/data/tasks" const MetaList = props => { const [drp_info1, setDrp_info1] = useState(false) const [inbox] =useState([ { id: 1, img: avatar1, name: 'Vaneet Kumar', tool:"Ping Checker", desc: "Software Dveloper", work: 'Done' }, { id: 2, img: avatar1, name: 'Uttam', tool:"Meta Data Checker", desc: "Django Dveloper", work: 'Pending' }, { id: 3, img: avatar1, name: 'Vikrant Kumar', tool:"Ping Checker", desc: "Python/Django Dveloper", work: 'Pending' }, { id: 4, img: avatar1, name: 'Jaspreet Singh', tool:"Seo Checker", desc: "Wordpress Dveloper", work: 'Pending' }, { id: 5, img: avatar1, name: 'Shrikant Hans', desc: "React Dveloper", tool:"Sitemap Checker", work: 'Pending' }, { id: 6, img: avatar1, name: 'Himanshu ', tool:"Image Optimization", desc: "Django Dveloper", work: 'Pending' }, { id: 7, img: avatar1, name: 'Anju Mam', desc: "Django Dveloper", tool:"Seo Checker", work: 'Pending' }, ]); const [filteredInbox, setFilteredInbox] = useState(inbox); // Function to handle filtering const filterByName = (name) => { const filteredData = inbox.filter((item) => item.name.includes(name)); setFilteredInbox(filteredData); }; return (
{/* Render Breadcrumbs */}
filterByName(e.target.value)} />
Name {filteredInbox.map((item, index) => ( ) )}
Avatar Name
jdfdjfhdjf dfgdgf
    {item.name}

    {item.desc}

    {/*
    {item.tool}
    www.google.com
    Ping Checker
    {drp_info1=== index?setDrp_info1(null):setDrp_info1(index)}}> Domains Action Another Action Another Action
    */}
    ))}
) } export default MetaList
